languages.text: {n}Инквизитор, стоящий среди гостей, тонко улыбается и склоняется к вам. Он шепчет:{/n} "Поздравляю вас с приобретением высокородного заложника. Браво".

traits.locale_text: {n}Инквизитор, стоящий среди гостей, тонко улыбается и склоняется к вам. Он шепчет:{/n} "Поздравляю вас с приобретением высокородного заложника. Браво".

languages.text: {n}The Inquisitor standing among the guests smiles faintly and leans toward you. He whispers,{/n} "I congratulate you on procuring a highborn hostage. Bravo."
languages.original_text: {n}Инквизитор, стоящий среди гостей, тонко улыбается и склоняется к вам. Он шепчет:{/n} "Поздравляю вас с приобретением высокородного заложника. Браво".

{n}The Inquisitor standing among the guests smiles faintly and leans toward you. He whispers,{/n} "I congratulate you on procuring a highborn hostage. Bravo."

languages.text: {n}ゲストの中に立っていた異端審問官がかすかに笑みを浮かべ、あなたに向かって身を乗り出してささやく。{/n}「おめでとうございます、ハイボーンの人質を取るとは。お見事です」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor standing among the guests smiles faintly and leans toward you. He whispers,{/n} "I congratulate you on procuring a highborn hostage. Bravo."

traits.locale_text: {n}ゲストの中に立っていた異端審問官がかすかに笑みを浮かべ、あなたに向かって身を乗り出してささやく。{/n}「おめでとうございます、ハイボーンの人質を取るとは。お見事です」

languages.text: {n}站在宾客之间的审判官露出了淡淡的笑意，朝你靠了过来，低声说道。{/n}“恭喜你抓到了贵族成员作为人质，干得漂亮。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor standing among the guests smiles faintly and leans toward you. He whispers,{/n} "I congratulate you on procuring a highborn hostage. Bravo."

traits.locale_text: {n}站在宾客之间的审判官露出了淡淡的笑意，朝你靠了过来，低声说道。{/n}“恭喜你抓到了贵族成员作为人质，干得漂亮。”

languages.text: {n}El Inquisidor que hay entre los invitados sonríe levemente y se inclina hacia ti. Susurra:{/n} «Enhorabuena por conseguir un rehén noble. Bravo».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor standing among the guests smiles faintly and leans toward you. He whispers,{/n} "I congratulate you on procuring a highborn hostage. Bravo."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Inquisidor que hay entre los invitados sonríe levemente y se inclina hacia ti. Susurra:{/n} «Enhorabuena por conseguir un rehén noble. Bravo».

languages.text: {n}L'inquisiteur, qui se tenait jusque-là au milieu des invités sans rien dire, se penche vers vous, un léger sourire aux lèvres.{/n} « Vous voilà donc {mf|affublé|affublée} d'un otage de la haute noblesse, {n}vous murmure-t-il.{/n} Toutes mes félicitations. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor standing among the guests smiles faintly and leans toward you. He whispers,{/n} "I congratulate you on procuring a highborn hostage. Bravo."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'inquisiteur, qui se tenait jusque-là au milieu des invités sans rien dire, se penche vers vous, un léger sourire aux lèvres.{/n} « Vous voilà donc {mf|affublé|affublée} d'un otage de la haute noblesse, {n}vous murmure-t-il.{/n} Toutes mes félicitations. »

languages.text: {n}Der Inquisitor, der bei den Gästen steht, lächelt verhalten und beugt sich zu dir. Er flüstert.{/n} "Ich beglückwünsche Euch zu einer hochstehenden Geisel. Bravo!"
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor standing among the guests smiles faintly and leans toward you. He whispers,{/n} "I congratulate you on procuring a highborn hostage. Bravo."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Inquisitor, der bei den Gästen steht, lächelt verhalten und beugt sich zu dir. Er flüstert.{/n} "Ich beglückwünsche Euch zu einer hochstehenden Geisel. Bravo!"

languages.text: {n}Konukların arasında duran Engizisyoncu, hafifçe gülümseyip sana doğru eğiliyor. Fısıldayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Eline soylu bir rehine geçirdiğin için tebrik ederim. Bravo."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor standing among the guests smiles faintly and leans toward you. He whispers,{/n} "I congratulate you on procuring a highborn hostage. Bravo."

traits.locale_text: {n}Konukların arasında duran Engizisyoncu, hafifçe gülümseyip sana doğru eğiliyor. Fısıldayarak konuşuyor.{/n} "Elinize soylu bir rehine geçirdiğiniz için tebrik ederim. Bravo."
